attributes.action: Stop people living better lives on benefits than workers.
attributes.additional_details: While some people genuinely need benefits and housing it is unfair on people who work everyday and have to make cuts that we have to sit and watch people living a good life in nice houses, driving nice cars, watching sky tv on their huge flatscreens whilst drinking and smoking and don't lift a finger to earn any of it. If a family gets help and goes on to have more kids, their choice they deal with it. No more endless handouts. Start a voucher system or points card to get what is needed and no more.
